messages.subject: Re intro
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings again, both long timers and newbies! I have been on the list forever it seems, but life always seems to catch up with me causing me to go web only
messages.messageBody:
Greetings again, both long timers and newbies!

I have been on the list forever it seems, but life always seems to catch up
with me causing me to go web only from time to time. I will introduce myself
for those who don't know me:)

My name is Teri Brown and I am an unschooling, momwriting, radical Christian
type of person. This list has always made me feel less weird(with my odd
unschooling beliefs) and that is probably why I like to hang here from time
to time:)

I have two children, dd,10 and ds,11 who love to do all sorts of things, most
of which make me feel like a cab driver without pay! I hope to be able to
stay a while this time.
Peace to all!
Teri

Co-author of Christian Unschooling: Growing Your Children in the Freedom of
Christ <A
HREF="http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1891400223/qid=995150597/sr=2-1/r

ef=aps_sr_b_1_1/002-2093926-5041661">Amazon.com: buying info: Christian
Unschooling : Growing Your Children in the F</A>
